name: Friedrich Engels
description: German philosopher, social scientist, journalist, and businessman. Co-founder of Marxism with Karl Marx. Best known for his contributions to revolutionary theory and his support of the working-class movement.

works.title: The Condition of the Working Class in England

name: Karl Marx
description: German philosopher, economist, and revolutionary socialist. Co-founder of Marxism and author of Das Kapital and the Communist Manifesto. Developed the theory of historical materialism and critique of political economy.
